mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id=#{0} and mem_pw=#{1}
select * from member where mem_id=#{0} and mem_pw=#{1} and mem_case=#{2}
select * from member where MEM_CASE=2 order by MEM_REGIDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, MEM_GENDER, MEM_CASE) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_gender}, 3 )
